title.jp: Toradora SOS! Connoisseurs Banzai Chiisana Inochi wo Tappuri Kurau Tsubutsubu Umai ze Viva Tarakosupa!

synopsis: When Ami complains about having to eat tarako spaghetti, Ryuji decides to take her to try some delicious tarako, competing with Minori's spaghetti bolognese.

title.jp: Toradora SOS! Connoisseurs Banzai Kodomo Sweets Sononaha Purin Purin Karada Oi no? Sukunai no?

synopsis: Ryuji and Minori have another food duel, this time involving purin.

title.jp: Toradora SOS! Connoisseurs Banzai India wa Curry wa Migite de Toire wa Hidarite Daradara Tsudzuku yo Curry-dou!

synopsis: When Yuri feels down after a failed attempt at getting a date, the gang takes her to the restaurant when Ryuji and Minori have a battle over curry. However, Minori's choice of curry is too hot for the girls to handle.

title.jp: Toradora SOS! Connoisseurs Banzai Kuwazugirai wa Yokunai yo! Ai Shite Yamanai, Itoushii Pink no Shimofuri Corned Beef

synopsis: Taiga, Ryuji and Minori follow Ami around the convenience store, where she buys copious amounts of corned beef.
